# Heritability

## Univariate

### `r r1_desc`

```{r, eval = TRUE}

melt_aireml(
  path = glue("data/f90/{params$rundate}_{params$r1}v{params$r2}_pwg/{r1_abbrv}/airemlf90.{r1_abbrv}.log"),
  effect2 = c(glue("{r1_abbrv}_dir")),
  resids = c(glue("{r1_abbrv}_resid"))
  ) %>% 
  filter(val1 == val2) %>% 
  select(-val2) %>% 
  mutate(val1 = str_remove(val1, glue("{r1_abbrv}_")))  %>% 
  spread(val1, var_cov) %>% 
  summarise(
    !!glue("Direct h2 ({ensym(r1_desc)})") := dir/sum(dir, resid),
    )

```


### `r r2_desc`

```{r, eval = TRUE}

melt_aireml(
  path = glue("data/f90/{params$rundate}_{params$r1}v{params$r2}_pwg/{r2_abbrv}/airemlf90.{r2_abbrv}.log"),
  effect2 = c(glue("{r2_abbrv}_dir")),
  resids = c(glue("{r2_abbrv}_resid"))
  ) %>% 
  filter(val1 == val2) %>% 
  select(-val2) %>% 
  mutate(val1 = str_remove(val1, glue("{r2_abbrv}_")))  %>% 
  spread(val1, var_cov) %>% 
  summarise(
    !!glue("Direct h2 ({ensym(r2_desc)})") := dir/sum(dir, resid),
    )

```

## Bivariate

```{r}
melt_aireml(
  path = glue("data/f90/{params$rundate}_{params$r1}v{params$r2}_pwg/airemlf90.{r1_abbrv}_{r2_abbrv}.log"),
  effect2 = c(glue("{r1_abbrv}_dir"), glue("{r2_abbrv}_dir")),
  resids = c(glue("{r1_abbrv}_resid"), glue("{r2_abbrv}_resid"))
  ) %>% 
  mutate(key = 
           case_when(
             str_detect(val1, r1_abbrv) ~ r1_desc, 
             str_detect(val1, r2_abbrv) ~ r2_desc,
             )
         ) %>% 
  filter(val1 == val2) %>% 
  select(-val2) %>% 
  mutate(val1 = str_remove(val1, glue("{r1_abbrv}_|{r2_abbrv}_"))) %>% 
  tidyr::pivot_wider(
    id_cols = key,
    names_from = val1,
    values_from = var_cov
    ) %>% 
  group_by(key) %>% 
  summarise(
    !!glue("Direct h2") := dir/sum(dir, resid),
    `Total variance` = sum(dir, resid)
    )
```
